testcase.name: Searching Product with valid user credebtials
testcase.system-out: Given user login into application...........................................passed And user search a "Product".................................................passed And user click on the add item to cart field................................passed And user click on the proceed to checkout field.............................passed And user click on agree term and proceed to checkout field..................passed And user add payment method.................................................passed When user click on the confirm order........................................passed Then user should be able to place order of the product......................passed
